import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' class UserForm extends Component { btnDisabled = () => ( ) btnOn = () => { } state = { firstName: '', lastName: '', username: '', country: '', email: '', password: '', conf_pass: '', policies: '', gender:'' }; handleChange = (e) => { // console.log(e.target.name, e.target.value); const { name, value } = e.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }); } render() { return (
First Name Last Name User ID Country Email address We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password Confirm Password {/* {this.state.policies === 'on' ? this.btnDisabled : this.btnOn} */}






{JSON.stringify(this.state, null, 2)}
) } } export default UserForm
